info.author: Jarosław Wygoda
info.description:
pystreamango
=======================

Python wrapper for `streamango.com`_ `API`_.

Install
-------

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install pystreamango


Usage
-----

All `API`_ features are implemented.

**Retrieve account info**

.. code:: python

    from streamango import Streamango

    # you can also set environment variables:
    # os.environ['STREAMANGO_LOGIN'] = 'login'
    # os.environ['STREAMANGO_KEY'] = 'key'
    sm = Streamango('login', 'key')

    account_info = sm.account_info()
    print(account_info)


**Upload file**

.. code:: python

    from streamango import Streamango

    sm = Streamango('login', 'key')

    uploaded_file_info = sm.upload_file('/home/username/file.mp4')
    print(uploaded_file_info)


**Retrieve file info**

.. code:: python

    from streamango import Streamango

    sm = Streamango('login', 'key')

    # Random file id.
    file_id = 'YMTqhQAuzVX'

    file_info = sm.file_info(file_id)
    print(file_info)

Documentation
-------------

documentation is available at https://pystreamango.readthedocs.io/.

.. _streamango.com: https://streamango.com
.. _API: https://streamango.com/api
info.name: pystreamango
